title: VNN401: Hanoi Sapa 4D3N
subtitle: Discover the breathtaking beauty of Vietnam's mountains and capital city
description: Discover the breathtaking beauty of Vietnam's mountains and capital
overview: Experience the stunning landscapes of Northern Vietnam with our carefully crafted 4-day journey from Hanoi to Sapa. This tour combines cultural immersion with natural beauty, taking you through ethnic villages, majestic mountains, and vibrant local markets.
highlights: 3 special meals: Buffet Fansipan - Buffet Sen - Hotpot salmon + red wine
day1_description: Pick up at airport - Transfer to Sapa - Cat Cat Village - Sapa night market
day2_description: Fansipan Mountain (Include Muong Hoa Train + Cable Car + Buffet) - Moana Sapa
day3_description: Back to Hanoi - Tran Quoc Pagoda - West Lake - Hanoi train track cafe (not include cafe fee)
day4_description: HCM Mausoleum - Shopping Hanoi Old Quarter - Mega Grand World - End of Tour

title: VNX001: Grand Vietnam Discovery 10D9N
subtitle: Experience all three regions of Vietnam
description: Complete Vietnam discovery from North to South
overview: Embark on an unforgettable 10-day journey through Vietnam's most captivating destinations. From the bustling streets of Hanoi to the serene waters of Ha Long Bay, the imperial grandeur of Hue, the ancient charm of Hoi An, and the vibrant energy of Ho Chi Minh City.
destination: Hanoi, Ha Long, Hue, Hoi An, Ho Chi Minh City
city: Hanoi, Ha Long, Hue, Hoi An, Ho Chi Minh City
highlights: Ha Long Bay overnight cruise, Imperial City Hue, Hoi An Ancient Town, Cu Chi Tunnels, Mekong Delta
day1_description: Airport pickup - Hanoi Old Quarter walking tour - Water puppet show - Welcome dinner
day2_description: Transfer to Ha Long Bay - Overnight cruise with kayaking and cave exploration
day3_description: Morning in Ha Long Bay - Flight to Hue - Imperial City tour
day4_description: Perfume River cruise - Royal tombs - Thien Mu Pagoda - Traditional music performance
day5_description: Journey via Hai Van Pass - Hoi An Ancient Town - Japanese Covered Bridge
day6_description: My Son Sanctuary - Tra Que Vegetable Village - Cooking class - Lantern festival
day7_title: Hoi An - Ho Chi Minh City
day7_description: Flight to HCMC - City orientation tour - Ben Thanh Market - Saigon River cruise
day8_description: Underground tunnels experience - War history - Local lunch - Cao Dai Temple
day9_description: Floating markets - Traditional villages - Coconut candy workshop - Boat trips
day10_description: Last minute shopping - Airport transfer - Departure
